what: A shiny GUI app for estimation of wet-season calendar parameters
title: A shiny GUI app for estimation of wet-season calendar parameters
text: shiny GUI app used compute visualize soil-water balance wet-season calendar parameters. app computes integrates daily potential evapotranspiration (PET) daily soil-water balance model estimate calendar wet-season agricultural applications.

title: A shiny GUI app for estimation of wet-season calendar parameters
text: can install development version AquaBEHERgui GitHub :
code: Install R and the required packages:      R >= 3.6      RStudio      R packages: devtools, shiny,       To install the above packages, in the R console, run:      install.packages("shiny")  # Get devtools package:   install.packages("devtools")    # Install the development version of AquaBEHERgui from [GitHub](https://github.com/RobelTakele/AquaBEHERgui):   devtools::install_github("RobelTakele/AquaBEHERgui")

title: Run the Shiny Application — run_app
code: run_app(   onStart = NULL,   options = list(launch.browser = TRUE, shiny.autoreload = TRUE),   enableBookmarking = NULL,   uiPattern = "/",   ... )

title: Run the Shiny Application — run_app
text: onStart function called app actually run. needed shinyAppObj, since shinyAppDir case, global.R file can used purpose. options Named options passed runApp call (can following: "port", "launch.browser", "host", "quiet", "display.mode" "test.mode"). can also specify width height parameters provide hint embedding environment ideal height/width app. enableBookmarking Can one "url", "server", "disable". default value, NULL, respect setting previous calls  enableBookmarking(). See enableBookmarking() information bookmarking app. uiPattern regular expression applied GET request determine whether ui used handle request. Note entire request path must match regular expression order match considered successful. ... arguments pass golem_opts. See `?golem::get_golem_options` details.
